reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Resistomap antibiotic resistance monitoring service in Indonesia

description.narrative: Resistomap has rare research expertise that enables us to employ a molecular genetic method and high-throughput SmartChip qPCR technology for monitoring the presence and quantity of antibiotic resistance genes from various sources. Resistomap antibiotic re sistance monitoring service includes:1. DNA extraction from the environmental samples such as but not limited to surface water from river and lake wastewater soil stool and tissue samples2. scalable detection and quantification of 12 to 384 antibiotic resi stance genes using the SmartChip qPCR technology3. automation of data-analysis and 4. an interactive report of the antibiotic resistance gene profile. To target the antibiotic resistance monitoring market in Indonesia we need local partners to receive and register the environmental samples from customers and to perform the DNA extraction. Having local partner(s) is needed because to transport the environmental samples requires Material Transfer of Agreement delivery with dry ice and complex regulations in t he custom. However if the samples are in the DNA form which means there is no potential dangerous hazardous and living materials the delivery from Indonesia to Finland can be done in a standard international courier service faster cheaper and easier regula tions in the custom. In Finland the DNA samples can be further processed for the SmartChip qPCR analysis at the Resistomap laboratory.Therefore the proposed project is for feasibility study of Resistomap antibiotic resistance monitoring service in Indonesi a by making a joint venture/ subsidiary company/ joint project with the Indonesian partners which are institutions that have a certified laboratory to perform molecular genetic methods such as for DNA extraction. The project is divided into three phases or objectives:1. To identify the partners2. To study the feasibility of Resistomap services3. To train the local staffs
